channel.title: Korasi Trouble
channel.description: Hi i have a korasi sword added on my server and the problem is it never loses spec like it keeps going you have unlimited specs, how would i change it to only having 2?

omg I am a noob it is in combatassistant.java lol

look for this public boolean checkSpecAmount(int weapon) {

item.title: Korasi Trouble
item.dc:creator: @DannyBoy1995 DannyBoy1995
item.description:
@DannyBoy1995 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:4, topic:391529”][quote author=DannyBoy1995 link=topic=488693.msg3572591#msg3572591 date=1303165229]

case 13350: c.gfx100(1224); c.startAnimation(1872); c.specAccuracy = 5.00; c.specDamage = 2.00; c.ssSpec = true; c.hitDelay = getHitDelay(c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]).toLowerCase()); break;

This is what i have in my item assistant can u fix it?

case 13350:
c.getPA().sendFrame171(0, 7599);
specialAmount(weapon, c.specAmount, 7611);
break;
[/quote]
What I gave goes in combatassistant.java[/quote]
yeah i just saw that this is what i have can u make it 2 specs?

case 13350:
c.gfx100(1224);
c.startAnimation(1872);
c.specAccuracy = 5.00;
c.specDamage = 2.00;
c.ssSpec = true;
c.hitDelay = getHitDelay(c.getItems().getItemName(c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon]).toLowerCase());
break;
